message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this product for $95. It's in excellent condition and worth a lot more than that. Let me know what you think!
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the condition of the product. I would like to counteroffer at $85.
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $85 is still a bit too low for me.  I'm willing to come down to $90, given its excellent condition.  What do you think?
Thank you for adjusting your price, Alice. I would like to counteroffer at $87.

Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal, but $87 just doesn't work for me.  I'm sticking with $90 for now. It's a fair price considering the quality of the product. Let me know if you're willing to budge.
I see, Alice. I am willing to go up to $88 for the product.
Bob, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I'm going to stick with $90 for now. It's a fair price for a product in this condition.  Let me know if you're willing to meet me there.
Considering the condition and value of the product, I am willing to pay $89.

Bob, I really appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I'm going to stick with $90 for now. It's a fair price for a product in this condition. This is my final offer.  Let me know if you're willing to meet me there.
